text:
This is really good, I wonder who composed it?


Also, I can't believe you're still steadily sharing all these great VGM tracks after nearly 13 years. I've found so much amazing music thanks to your channel :) it's actually enriched my life experience and broadened my musical awareness, and I'm sure many others would express the same. Thank you!

text: I remember getting a Wii U as a Christmas gift during my final year of high school. The first thing I wanted to do was pre-order Smash and purchase Earthbound. This was the theme I was greeted with and will forever be the track that reminds me of when I first got my Wii U. Simpler times...
